medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced sudden onset of severe RUQ pain, which began 15 hours prior to presentation at 3 AM. The pain has been persistent since its onset. The patient also reported nausea but denied any vomiting. There were no associated fever, chills, diarrhea, or constipation. The patient denied any similar pain in the past.
medical_history.social_history: No tobacco use, no alcohol consumption, no intravenous drug use.
